body: While PHPUnit is tested on PHP 8 in continuous integration, PHPUnit is not supported on PHP 8 yet.

rename.from: Can't mock interfaces with constructor on PHP 8
rename.to: Cannot double interfaces that declare a constructor with PHP 8

body:
The root cause for this is that `ReflectionMethod::isConstructor()` behaves differently in PHP 7 and PHP 8.

Details can be found [here](https://news-web.php.net/php.internals/109377).

issue.title: Update phpunit/phpunit from 8.3.4 to 8.5.3

issue.title: Update phpunit/phpunit from 8.3.4 to 8.5.6
issue.body:
If you have a high test coverage index, and your tests for this pull request are passing, it should be both safe and recommended to merge this update.

  Here is a list of changes between the version you use, and the version this pull request updates to:

issue.title: Update phpunit/phpunit from 8.3.4 to 8.5.7
issue.body:
If you have a high test coverage index, and your tests for this pull request are passing, it should be both safe and recommended to merge this update.

  Here is a list of changes between the version you use, and the version this pull request updates to:

  - [809b4bf67](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/commit/809b4bf67) Prepare release
- [fa13e61ad](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/commit/fa13e61ad) Update Psalm baseline

- [a4baf33f0](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/commit/a4baf33f0) Update tools
- [8eaf8535a](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/commit/8eaf8535a) Remove test which a) does not seem to work on GitHub Actions (but does locally) and b) which does not actually test the exit code
- [0ae869075](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/commit/0ae869075) Closes #4299
- [7258f8faf](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/commit/7258f8faf) Only print resource usage information when tests were run

issue.title: Update phpunit/phpunit from 8.3.4 to 8.5.8

issue.title: Update phpunit/phpunit from 8.3.4 to 8.5.9
issue.body:
If you have a high test coverage index, and your tests for this pull request are passing, it should be both safe and recommended to merge this update.

### Updated packages

Some times an update also needs new or updated dependencies to be installed. Even if this branch is for updating one dependency, it might contain other installs or updates. All of the updates in this branch can be found here.

<details>

- doctrine/instantiator: 1.4.0 (updated from 1.2.0)

</details>

issue.title: Update phpunit/phpunit from 8.3.4 to 8.5.10
issue.body:
If you have a high test coverage index, and your tests for this pull request are passing, it should be both safe and recommended to merge this update.

### Updated packages

issue.title: Update phpunit/phpunit from 8.3.4 to 8.5.12
issue.body:
If you have a high test coverage index, and your tests for this pull request are passing, it should be both safe and recommended to merge this update.

### Updated packages

issue.title: Update phpunit/phpunit from 8.3.4 to 8.5.13

issue.title: Update phpunit/phpunit from 8.3.4 to 8.5.18
issue.body:
